content: I'm trying to put in a Jira ticket for ProdCharacteristic and I don't see it (I also don't see R4B in the Versions)
And I'm fairly certain that R4B is a thing
re ProdCharacteristic itself, it is intended to be deprecated. I think DeviceDefinition still uses it but I have a Jira somewhere that seeks to change that and replace with a code/value pair thing.
I didn't add R4B to versions as my understanding is that R4B is just going to become the new 'R4', though we can discuss that.
It would be good if R4B was there for the ballot for clarity
Ok. Added R4B. SHould show up in 5 minutes or so
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-30274 may be of interest. If that happens, ProdCharacteristic is gone completely
So the fact that it was just added is quite confusing.
well it was just added in the same way that R4B has just been added. It has existed for several years
So, do you want comments on it?

happy to have them, but since I plan to remove it, assuming that happens, changes to it may not be worth raising. Unless you want to keep it alive, your comments may be moot. I didn't want it in R4B, but it had to be there because it has not been removed from DeviceDefinition.
